CustomField.description: Managing the relationships with investors based on Tiers by relationship needs (need to create a field for this in SF): Tier 1 – strategic – will do co-invests or over $100M – focus on visiting them frequently Goal: 1 meeting and 1-2 interaction and/or 1 interaction with assigned key Investment Professional – per year Tier 2 – high – geography based, either in the same city as a Tier 1 or if it makes sense for a roadshow (ie clustered investors in a group) Goal: 1 interaction per 18 months Tier 3 – Low – doesn’t need to have a relationship with the investment professionals. IR team can be the key relationship holders
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For the BIF Team to help prioritize their investors: 1 – Strategic: will do co-invests or over $100M 2 – High: geography based, either in the same city as a Tier 1 or if it makes sense for a roadshow 3 – Low: IR team can manage the relationship
